page.title: 13TRADE ,MARKET,SHOPS,
page.content: Sturminster Newton is famous for its cattle market where calves ,cows ect. are auctioned ,most of the beef calves stay in the U.K. About 10% go abroad. 70% of the Fresians stay in the U.K.& 30% go abroad.The average price of all calves for the first 6 month is Â£85 .Approx. price of bull calves. CONTINENTAL CALVES = Â£200, BLACK & WHITE HEREFORD = &175, RED& WHITE HEREFORD = Â£140, FRESIAN = Â£150. Approx. prices of heifers CONTINENTAL HEIFERS=Â£150, BLACK & WHITE HEIFERS= Â£118, RED & WHITE HEIFERS=Â£95, FRESIAN =Â£110. These are the types of shops in Sturminster; CHEMIST, FOOD, CLOTHES, NOVELTY,ANTIQUE, ESTATE AGENTS, WINE, PET, PUBS & INNS, POST OFFICE, BANK, HAIRDRESSERS, ELECTRICAL, COAL, TRAVEL AGENT, LAUNDRETTE, SPORT, OPTICIAN,AND CAMERA.
